document_data.name: Xonthal's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Xonthal's Tower''' was a tower in the [[Western Heartlands]] that housed the [[wizard]] [[Xonthal]] after [[1361 DR]].
document_data.History:
The tower became famous in the [[Realms]] for its unusual magical defenses, including the magical hedge maze that surrounded it.

In [[1365 DR|1365]]â€“[[1366 DR]], a group of [[Zhentarim]] under [[Hansibal Droun]], a shopkeeper of the [[Xonthal's Tower (village)|village]] near the tower, tried to conquer it for its strategic commercial value. However, Xonthal always defeated them.

Just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]], the [[Cult of the Dragon]] managed to acquire the tower.
document_data.Inhabitants: During the Tyranny, the Cult's leaders based at the Tower were the [[dracolich]] traditionalists [[Jorgen Pawl]] and his lieutenant [[Iskander]].
